Keywords: Codex , Maximum Carnage , Monster
Real Name: Various
Special Powers
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Carnage Minion hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
SYMBIOTE CODEX HUNTER: Plasticity, Shape Change. // When Carnage Minion KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead.
4-ARMED KILLING MACHINE: Flurry, Sidestep.

September 15, 2020
Daunting Mountain
If the dial turns to a KO click, it is KO'd and can't be healed. After resolutions, you immediately give the action token, which immediately deals pushing damage, which immediately KOs them. Healing after resolutions takes place after all the "immediately" effects.
September 15, 2020
KingJW06
Is that how it works? I thought because pushing was unavoidable damage that it would be dealt immediately and not after the ability activates.

Actually, it could potentially benefit from healing 3. On its last click if it kills a codex fig on a push, then it would take 1 damage and heal 3 putting it top dial.
